name: The Grinning Fall
description:
Your mind is stuck on a strange scary forest,  Stay happy or just DIE.

Instructions :

Use arrow keys to Move
Always grab the stuff that makes you happy like Games, Soccer balls and Music.
Happy means slower game-play and sad means faster game-play

Criteria : 
Endless runner : You have to fall thought and endless level.

Happy : Collect stuff that makes you happy. The speed or the difficulty of the game depends on the happiness of the player.

Hyperactive : This is a fast placed endless game so, the speed of the game will increase & decrease depending on the happiness level of the player and you can't take your eyes away from the screen.

Chiptune : The game features cool chiptune music.

Credits : 

Trevor Lentz - line of code music
font : Comfortaa
Emojies : EmojiOne

Gameplay, Assets : Gatheesha (me)

Made in 96h for JamGoJam JAM DNA 15
